title: Pig

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Ridicule (3 Uses): Visit your target. Depending on what they do tonight, Ridicule has different effects.
- If your target would kill another player, their killed player is cleaned.
- If your target would give another player a notification (ie: Caroler uses ability on another player, doctor protects someone and they would receive a message they were attacked and healed), they instead give no notifications.
- If your target would investigate, you can remove their original feedback and give them different results. (You see their results before being prompted to change them)
- If none of the above happen, roleblock your target astrally.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You start with a random town target who is not Town Power.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: After you are hanged, see your target die.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4474
*The self-proclaimed king bellowed out his response to the insolent jester, "Ye art more similar to swine than I! Thy headeth wilt beest staked and placed among the pigpen at midnight. Ye art naught but a filthy fool, deserved to beest with pig of thy kind!"*
